description: This file defines a logging utility by wrapping an external logging module, importing system and OS modules, and creating a factory function for log objects.

methods.name: Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
methods.description: Creates and returns a Log object from the external logging module with the specified parameters.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False):$/
ctags.signature: (name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
